::DrillBit::

He heard Megaton. He opened a comm to him.
"This is commander DrillBit. We are preparing to recieve you, please
hold on."
He taped a few keys on the computer, putting the base on stand by battle
stations. He then opened a comm to DarkFate.
"Are you hearing this guy, outside the base? What should we do?"
